sentences.english: But apples are also one of the most pesticide-contaminated fruits and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 但是蘋果也是農藥殘留最多的蔬果之一。

sentences.english: Eating fresh fruit and vegetables helps people resist the temptation of waist-expanding treats, scientists have found.
sentences.chinese: 科學家發現，食用新鮮的蔬果有助於抑制食慾。

sentences.english: Use either a mandoline or a large-size grater to shred. Set aside.
sentences.chinese: 再用蔬果刨或大刨絲器將之刨成幼絲，備用。

sentences.english: Aim for five to nine or even 13 servings of fruits and vegetables a day.
sentences.chinese: 打算一天喫五到九種，甚至十三中蔬果。

sentences.english: Everyone in the Zuvela family grow organic fruit and vegetable.
sentences.chinese: 儒菲拉家族每個人都種有機蔬果。

sentences.english: I bought some oranges at the greengrocer's.
sentences.chinese: 我從蔬果店買了些桔子。

sentences.english: Add inside cistern set net wearing, can deposit dishcloth to reach wait for washed vegetables and fruits.
sentences.chinese: 水槽內加設網架，可存放抹布及待洗的蔬果。

sentences.english: This is the juice we drink almost every day.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們幾乎每天喝的蔬果汁。

sentences.english: C. O. : I'm sorry. No fresh fruits, vegetables, or meats may be brought in.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，生鮮蔬果及肉類都不能帶入境。

sentences.english: In addition, microbes can form biofilms on the surfaces of fruits and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，是因爲細菌會在蔬果表面形成生物膜。

sentences.english: Wash and peel vegetables and fruits before use if they were not already harvested.
sentences.chinese: 使用輻射發生之後收穫的蔬果前必須清洗去皮。

sentences.english: I did a few more juice fasts, still there wasn't any marked improvement.
sentences.chinese: 接下來我又做了幾次蔬果汁斷，卻沒有再進步。

sentences.english: They're higher in vitamins such as A and C. Or go for darker shades of greens.
sentences.chinese: 這些蔬果的維他命C和A含量很高。

sentences.english: Also, feed nori or high vegetation flak food.
sentences.chinese: 還有，喂海苔或高蔬果含量之片狀餌料。
你有堅持“每日五蔬果”麼？

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
